h1: Merging 2 sf obcects leads to signifant loss of information
code:
# Convert sf objects to data frames
dfdatatabad <- as.data.frame(databad)
dfAC <- as.data.frame(AC)

# Perform the merge based on the common columns
merged_df <- merge(dfdatatabad, dfAC, by.x = " ", by.y = "AC_NO")

# Convert the merged data frame back to an sf object
merged_sf <- st_as_sf(merged_df)

databad<-structure(list(ac_code = c(259L, 259L, 259L), booth_no = 1:3,

    ), voteshare.CPI.ML..L. = c(NA_real_, NA_real_, NA_real_), 
    voteshare.IUML = c(NA_real_, NA_real_, NA_real_), voteshare.GaAP = c(NA_real_,

        structure(c(87.7090902547602, 87.7151753707173, 87.7154550055682,
